Pablino is from the inner part of the country. He lives with his parents and works in agriculture and as a taxi driver. He tells us that he is also studying his final year of nursing.

Pablino's goal is to finish his studies in order to work in a health clinic where he can help other people. He is inspired by his parents, who have always helped him to achieve his goals.

Pablino is applying for this loan in order to invest in paying for his university fees. With these paid, he can continue to study.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Juntas Podemos Group

texts.es:
Juntas Podemos es un grupo nuevo, que se unió para que por medio del trabajo en conjunto vayan creciendo, y gracias a su unión ya están en su segundo ciclo, con mucho entusiasmo. Ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde la Sra. Elizangela, una de las integrantes se dedica a la venta de comidas y de ropas.
Ella se define a sí misma como una persona que es capaz de luchar por su familia y seres queridos para darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener, y comenta que  el préstamo lo utiliza para la compra de insumos para seguir haciendo sus comidas y para comprar prendas de vestir de temporada. Según su encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza ella ha mejorado mucho.
texts.en:
"Juntas Podemos" (We Can Do It Together) is a new group.  The members joined with each other so that they could work together in order to grow.  Thanks to this union, they have entered into their second loan cycle with great enthusiasm.  The members are also participating in the poverty elimination program.  

Sra. Elizangela is one of the members who sells food and clothes.  She defines herself as a capable person who strives on behalf of her family and her loved ones.  Elizangela wants to give them everything that she did not have.  She says that her loan will be used to buy supplies so that she can continue preparing her food.  In addition, she will buy seasonal clothing.  Based on the result from her poverty elimination survey, Elizangela has greatly improved.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing food and seasonal clothing to sell.

loans.name: Robert

texts.es:
Robert actualmente está trabajando en una panadería, a la vez está estudiando Profesorado en Informática, de aquí a unos años se ve ejerciendo su profesión para así poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de él y su familia.
Él es muy dedicado a sus estudios es por eso que está sobresaliendo y quiere seguir haciéndolo. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, y así poder cubrir los gastos que originan terminar la carrera.
texts.en:
Robert is currently working at a bakery and also studying to teach computer skills. In a few years time he expects to be working in his profession in order to improve his and his family's living conditions.

Robert is very dedicated to his studies and so they are going very well. He wants to keep this up. Robert is applying for this loan in order to invest in the costs of taking out his degree title. With this loan he can cover the costs of finishing his degree.

loans.use: to pay fees to take out his degree qualification.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Victoria está en su ciclo número cinco del programa de comité de mujeres, donde lo que destaca a cada una de ellas es el espíritu solidario que tienen, y las ganas de salir adelante que tienen.
Wilfrida es vendedora de lencería y de ropas varias, un trabajo que hoy dia tiene mucha competencia, pero que ella igualmente lucha por poder salir adelante. Se destaca ella por ser una persona muy entusiasta, y activa, de espíritu jovial. Comenta que pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas variadas, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus ventas y ofreciendo una buena variedad de prendas a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group “La Victoria” is in its fifth cycle with the women’s committee program.  What really stands out is the supportive spirit that they have, along with a strong desire to get ahead.

Wilfrida is a retailer who sells lingerie and various types of clothing.  This is a field that has a lot of competition these days, but she keeps pushing to be able to get ahead nevertheless.  She stands out for being a very active and enthusiastic person with a youthful spirit.  She shares that she is asking for this loan to buy various items of clothing.  In this way she will be able to keep going with her sales, offering a good variety of items to her customers.

loans.use: to buy various garments to sell.

loans.name: San Ramon Group

texts.es:
El comité llamado San Ramon  forma parte del programa de comité de mujeres, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Brigida, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total, ya que con ello podrá dar un mejor bienestar a su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica en la venta de comestibles de manera grupal con sus compañeras del comité y  a la cría de animales que por formar parte de comité ella recibe este beneficio para mejorar sus ingresos. Ella está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza que les permitirá conocer la situación en la que esta y conforme a ello trabajar.
La Sra. Brigida  Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de sus insumos para la elaboración de sus comestibles, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The "San Roman" communal bank is part of a women's program, of which Señora Brigida is a member. Through effort, continuous work and the application of the vital habits of a successful woman, she is improving her impoverished situation. She is also aware that the work and effort that she is carrying out has to be continuous and permanent in order to achieve a complete success, which would mean that she is able to improve her family's well-being. 

Among the work she does, she says that she works selling edible goods as a cooperative with her fellow committee members and raising animals. For being part of the communal bank she receives profits to improve her income. She is completing the "eliminating poverty" survey which will allow them to understand the situation she is in and plan according to the results.

Señora Brigida is asking for this loan in order to buy ingredients to make the food, such as meat, vegetables, condiments and more. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving, as it will be a great help.

loans.use: buy ingredients for preparing edible goods.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
La Sra. Sara desde  muy joven trabajó en el campo, realizando limpieza y cultivos varios. Luego se dedicó a la cría de animales, tales como cerdos, que vendía cada cierto tiempo, luego se casó formando su hogar, llegando a tener varios hijos. Cultivaba  en compañía de su marido y criaban  animales vacunos.
Tiempo después enviudó quedándose ella sola a criar a sus hijos, y ella sola, con sacrificio continuó sola la actividad que  hacía.
Es muy querida en su zona por ser una persona muy trabajadora y servicial.    
Solicita el préstamo para compra de animales vacunos para continuar con su actividad, y de esa forma seguir luchando por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es la única que sostiene su casa.
texts.en:
Señora Sara has worked from a very young age - in the fields, growing crops and cleaning. Then she worked raising animals such as pigs, which she would sell every so often. Later she got married and started a family, managing to have several children. Together with her husband she raised cattle. Some time after she was widowed, leaving her to raise her children by herself. With sacrifice she continued the work they did together.

Señora Sara is very loved in her area as she is in a very hardworking and helpful person.

Señora Sara is asking for this loan in order to buy cattle to continue her work. This will mean she can continue fighting to help her family get ahead, as she is the only breadwinner of the household.

loans.use: to buy cattle to sell.

loans.name: Alegre Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo Alegre Poty esta en su tercer ciclo, ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, donde hacen la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, como un medio de poder conocer el nivel en que esta cada una.
Por ejemplo Sra. Limpia, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir que está en un nivel medio de ingresos y condiciones de vida generales. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas como actividad principal y con la que ayuda a su familia a poder salir adelante.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de sus  ropas variadas: remeras, pantalones jeans, etc. lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The "Alegre Poty" group is in its third loan cycle. They are part of the poverty elimination program, where they complete the poverty survey as a way of understanding each member's situation.

For example, Señora Limpia, who in her last survey showed a poverty level of level 2, which is to say that she has an average level of income and general living conditions. She works selling clothes as her main source of income and with that she helps her family to move forward.

Señora Limpia is asking for this credit in order to buy various clothes; vests, jeans etc., which will help her to finalize her business plan and so help her to increase her income.

loans.use: buy various clothes.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
16 son las mujeres que integran este grupo, ellas están en su primer ciclo, empezando a trabajar juntas, y a fomentar el compañerismo. Forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas ellas están por debajo de la línea de la pobreza.
Lurdes es una de las integrantes, ella por su parte se dedica a la peluquería, y comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, ya que siempre da su mejor trabajo a sus clientes, y que luego ellos mismos vuelven y esa es su mejor publicidad. Es una persona muy hábil en lo que hace.
Pide este préstamo para comprar insumos para su peluquería, como ser tintes, shampoo, cremas, enjuagues, spray y demás, ya que con esto podrá seguir atendiendo a sus clientes y mejorando sus ingresos y por ende su situación de pobreza.
texts.en:
Sixteen women make up this group.  They are in their first loan cycle, beginning to work together and forge a sense of togetherness.  They make up part of the Elimination of Poverty program, where all of them are found to be below the poverty line.  

Lurdes is one of the members.  She works in hairstyling and says that she has built up a strong customer base.  This is because she has always done her best work on her clients.  Her customers keep returning, and this is the best form of advertising.  She is very capable at what she does.

She is asking for this loan to buy supplies for her salon such as dyes, shampoo, lotions, rinses, sprays, and others.  With this she will be able to keep taking care of her clients, improving her income, and therefore her impoverished situation.

loans.use: to buy items for a salon such as dyes, shampoo, lotions, rinses, sprays, and others.

loans.name: Las Amigas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Las amigas está en su ciclo 21  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y luchando por mejorar la situación de pobreza que puedan llegar a tener, todo esto tratando de ayudarse siempre.
Maria, una de las integrantes se dedica a la venta de bebidas de todas clases, y comenta que tiene muy buena venta, ya que se viene la época de calor, que es cuando más ventas tiene. Con su pequeño negocio tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas varias, como ser gaseosas, cervezas y vinos, y de esa forma estar bien surtida, ya que tiene mucha venta.
texts.en:
The group called “Las Amigas” is in its 21st cycle of the Women’s Committee program, where everyone commits to work and help each other to get ahead.  They are completing the Elimination of Poverty survey and fighting to improve the situation of poverty that they have, all the while trying to help each other.

One of the group members, Maria, works selling all types of drinks and says that she has very good sales numbers.  This is because the hot season has begun, which is when she has more sales.  With her small business she has the means to be able to help her family and her loved ones.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of various beverages, such as soda, beer, and wine, and in this way to be well-stocked, because she has a lot of sales to make.

loans.use: to buy sodas, beer, and wine, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Aty Group

texts.es:
Kuña Guapa Aty se destaca por ser un grupo muy trabajador, ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, que les permitirá ir creciendo cada vez un poco mas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cinthia, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que tiene ingresos muy bajos. Ella se dedica a ser decoradora, donde asiste a eventos y los decora muy bien siempre, es conocida por su buen trabajo, y es así que le va muy bien, Su meta es seguir trabajando para ayudar a su familia. Pide este préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, pegamentos, apliques y demás, con lo que podrá seguir decorando y trabajando.
texts.en:
Kuña Guapa Aty stands out as a very hard-working group. The women are in the Poverty Elimination programme, which allows them to continue to grow steadily.

One of the members is Cinthia, who came out in her survey with a poverty level of one, which means that she has a very low income. She is a decorator; that is, she attends events and always decorates them well. She is known for her good work and therefore it is going very well. Her goal is to continue working in order to help her family. She is asking for this loan to buy material, thread, glues, appliqués and other items so she can continue to decorate and do her work.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, glue, appliqués and other items to use for decorations.

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
San Blas es un grupo formado en Ciudad del Este, tiene 15 integrantes, cada una mujer muy trabajadora que ayuda a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, para poder conocer su situación y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Librada, quien aparte de ser miembro de este grupo también es la presidenta, y comenta que es una gran responsabilidad para ella, ya que también siempre trata de ayudar a sus compañeras. Librada se dedica a la venta de confites, es decir de masas dulces, ella misma las hace, y es muy buena en ello. Comenta que siempre tiene buenos pedidos, y es por eso que le va bien. Pide este préstamo para invertirlo en insumos para hacer sus confites, como ser maicena, manteca, azúcar, dulces, y demás.
Todas agradecen por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder mejorar por medio del trabajo y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
San Blas is a group of 15 members from Ciudad del Este. Each of the women is very hard-working and helps her family through her work. They are all completing a survey about eliminating poverty, so that they can understand their situation and be able to work accordingly. 

One of the member is Librada, who, apart from being a member of the group, is also the president. She states that it is a big responsibility for her and that she also always tries to help her fellow members. Librada sells sweets, that is, sweet pastries.  She makes them herself and is very good at it. She states that she always has a lot of orders so her business is going well. She is asking for this loan to invest in supplies for making her creations, such as cornstarch, butter, sugar, sweets, etc. 

They are all grateful for the opportunity they are receiving to improve their lives through work and training.

loans.use: to buy corn starch, butter, sugar, sweets, etc. to make her creations.

loans.name: San Juan Bosco Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes del grupo San Juan Bosco están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, a través del cual ellas podrán conocer el nivel de ingresos y la situación en la que cada una se encuentra.
Mabel es parte d este grupo, ella se dedica a vender frutas, y comenta que su día a día empieza muy temprano en la mañana. Siempre trata de ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, darles lo mejor y que no les falte nada.
Mabel pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas de estación, como ser manzanas, sandias, melones y demás y de esa forma seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The members of the San Juan Bosco Group are doing the Poverty Elimination Survey, through which they will be able to identify the income levels and situation of each of them.

Mabel is part of this group. She works selling fruits. She says her day-to-day begins very early in the morning. She always tries to help her family through her work, giving them the best so they do not want for anything.

Mabel requests this loan to invest in the purchase of seasonal fruit, such as apples, watermelons, melons and others to continue working as she has been.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit, such as apples, watermelons, melons and others.

loans.name: San Jorge Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Jorge está en su Tercer ciclo del programa de comités, donde ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que les permitirá conocer en qué situación se encuentra cada una de ellas, y conforme a ello poder trabajar. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Rosa, una mujer muy trabajadora, ella sobresale ya que siempre es muy activa, y por medio de su trabajo siempre trata de poder ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que tiene.
Rosa pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas variadas, ya que ella se dedica a la venta de las mismas. Ella está muy agradecida por la oportunidad que todas están recibiendo de seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The communal bank "San Jorge" is in its third funding cycle with the Programa de Comités,  They are doing the poverty elimination survey, which allows them to become familiar with the financial situation each of them finds themselves in.  From there, they can work to improve their situation. 
One of the members of the communal bank is Sra. Rosa.  She is a very had-working woman.  She stands out because she is always very active. She is always trying to help her family with the income she earns through her work. 
Rosa is asking for this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of various jewelry items, as she makes her living selling the same.  Rosa is very grateful for the opportunity they are all being granted to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase various jewelry items for re-sale.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
21 mujeres integra esta grupo muy trabajador y luchador, ellas son personas que quieren salir adelante por medio del esfuerzo y el trabajo en conjunto. Todas son jefas de familia, que tienen como meta dar a sus hijos lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Ursulina y el trabajo que ella hace es comprar y vender frutas y verduras en forma ambulante.  Por medio de su trabajo y sumado a su esfuerzo es la forma en la que ayuda a su familia, ella es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha por salir adelante.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de manzanas, bananas, piñas, melones, sandias entre otros; lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Twenty-one hard-working and determined women make up this communal bank.  They are all people who want to get ahead through their hard work and working together.  They are all heads of their households whose goals are giving their children what they, themselves, weren't able to have. 
One of the members of the communal bank is Señora Ursulina.  Her work is buying and selling fruit and vegetables.  She works as a street vendor.  She helps her family through her work and effort.  She is a very hard-working person who is determined to get ahead.  
Sra. Ursulina is requesting this loan in order to purchase apples, bananas, pineapples, melon and watermelons, among other items, which will help her to solidify her business plan and continue improving her income.

loans.use: to purchase apples, bananas, pineapples, melons and watermelons, among other items.
